# Betterment for Advisors

## Overview
- **Website:** https://www.betterment.com/advisors
- **Category:** Robo-Advisor Platform & Tech-Enabled Custodian
- **Description:** Betterment Advisor Solutions is a tech-enabled custodian built for independent RIAs
- **Status:** Active
- **Last Updated:** 2026-02-12

## Pricing Tiers
Tiered pricing based on account count

## Key Features
Portfolio management, tax-loss harvesting, client onboarding

## Add-On Products & Services
Betterment 401(k) for Advisors
Betterment Cash Reserve
Tax-Smart Transitions
Dedicated Support Team
RIA Tech Suite

## Integrations
Wealthbox, Orion, Docupace, Capitect, eMoney Advisor, Addepar

## API & Developer Info
API available via partnership agreement

## Support & Documentation
Help center, documentation, training resources

## Evaluation Notes
### Pros
1. No minimum AUM requirements
2. No upfront costs
3. Tax-loss harvesting
4. Direct indexing
5. Cash Reserve integration

### Cons
1. No public pricing
2. Limited portfolio customization
3. No manual trading
4. Limited asset classes

### Alternatives
- Orion
- Black Diamond
- Envestnet

### Use Cases
**Ideal For:** Advisors wanting comprehensive platform
**Not Ideal For:** Those needing transparent pricing

### Key Differentiators
1. All-in-one platform
2. Tax-smart investing
3. No minimums
4. Dedicated support
5. Modern technology
